subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Batting second, Carlos Beltrán had four hits, blasted his team-leading fourth home run and scored twice as the Mets pounded Florida’s rookie right-hander Rick Vanden Hurk for eight runs.
snippet: Batting second, Carlos Beltrán had four hits, blasted his team-leading fourth home run and scored twice as the Mets pounded Florida’s rookie right-hander Rick Vanden Hurk for eight runs.
